title: Good puzzle
text:
I started out feeling like I had regrets. The side pieces are not necessarily side pieces. There are flat and flatter pieces that go in the middle of the puzzle. The pieces are not at all normal shapes. This was surely a challenge to complete and not my wisest pick for my first 1,000 piece puzzle. All pieces were present and accounted for. Once completed it is a lovely puzzle. I decided to mod podge it and frame it.

The loss of one star is because several of the pieces were not cut clearly and had paper bits that needed removed. That's my only complaint on this puzzle, but it was several pieces I had to carefully remove the excess paper bits from in order for the pieces to all fit like they're suppose to. Otherwise it would have five stars.

title: My Friend Loves this Gift!
text:
A really good friends shares my love for Harlequin Great Danes. She has a big uncropped girl named Maggie. I often get her a calendar, but most of the pictures this year didn't feature Harlequins. So I went searching for something else.

This little pup has made her so happy. My friend keeps Lil Maggie at work and big Maggie at home. She even said she noticed some similar markings on both of her Maggies.

title: Olaf hangs out in my office
text: This little guy was as advertised. He talks saying some of his signature expressions. Mostly he just hangs out looking very inquisitive. He brings smiles to people who come into my office. When I feel stressed l take a few minutes with Olaf & we sing the Summer song or Do you want to build a snowman? and things seem manageable again. I've always liked snowmen (even the mean & very creative ones Calvin & Hobbes built), but Olaf is special. I've seen some larger versions in stores but they are not as cute as my little guy. And the price was reasonable.

title: a very good investment
text: What a difference a few minutes can make. I'm getting about twice the flight/video time with the 1500mah battery vs. my original 1000mah battery (approx 17 minutes vs 8 minutes). These appear to be of the same quality as the original Parrot battery. They're slightly larger and fit the AR drone and stock charger snugly, but without difficulty. The price is very good - for about $50 you can get two of these and always have a spare on hand and charging while you fly.

title: Super Baby Swing Seat
text:
100 % - 5 Star rating!!!
Well made; very soft yet sturdy and comfortable baby seat; child "pinch proof" chain
overall excellent product
We used new swing hardware for our new 4x6x12 beam and the solid bearings are bigger than the attach hooks sent with the swing so I bought new ones one size bigger. NOT a vendor issue it was a compatibility issue because I wanted "bearing" swing hangers and NOT plastic washer types
This will work great for our next child and it's getting lots of use in our neighborhood
Fast delivery and great product from this vendor!!!

title: Extremely Strong Swing Set Bracket
text:
This is an Amazon product and it is a super product! It is well made and solid. All the hardware is in the box. If your working on a swing set then you should have the few basic tools needed; a drill for pilot holes for the 3 inch lag bolts; wrench or socket for the lag bolts (9/16 inch socket or wrench). Assembly requires two 4x4x8 treated boards for the legs. And, one 4x6x12 (for three swing set)
Here's the glitch for easy installation. We went to a box store and bought a true cut 4x6x12 treated beam. But, the bracket section for this 4x6x12 beam is true to size and will not fit a treated 4x6 beam because treated wood is actually slightly bigger; about 1/4 inch on all sides. You have to shave about 1/4 inch x 10 inches off one side of the 4x6 beam and 1/4 inch off the top or bottom of the beam as well. Then this brace will slide in without banging the beam or bracket. Do NOT bang the bracket! We used spray cooking oil after we shaved it on the beam and bracket and it slid in perfect. If you look closely at the photos you can see we shaved the 4x6 beam to fit
There is NOTHING wrong with this bracket! It is designed to fit a 4x6 size beam BUT treated wood is still sold as a 4x6 product but it is slightly thicker
Regardless, trim it a little like mentioned and it will work great and be extremely secure and strong!
I would buy it again without hesitation!!!

If it was opened previously then you expected that might happen but brand new and sealed? I didn't think it was possible and turned my house inside out and it's not here,  so I'm sure it didn't make it into the box in the first place. Will make me question getting them in the future, but so far this is the only one (out of 5 I think?) that has had this issue.

title: Robot was a bad experience but received excellent customer service
text:
It was not fun for anyone and we are intelligent people. Too many bags of various pieces, too many small pieces that look alike, poorly fit with frustrating directions. Our 10 yr. old grandson got bored and walked away and he is a complex lego lover. The goal became just to get it together enough so he could run it with the remote. UPDATE: Though I can not change my rating on the Robot I have upped the rating for their excellent customer service who reached out to me wanting to help the situation. They are very professional and sincere in their assistance. I thank them for that.

title: Big Hit for Melissa and Doug fans
text: This puzzle is one of the harder M & D floor puzzles (which is what I was looking for).  It has 100 pieces where as many are 50 or fewer.  I have to agree with another reviewer that the picture of the puzzle is TINY on the side of the box.  The picture on the box cover is just a part of the picture.  Many M & D puzzles do that.  Older ones used to enclose a picture of the puzzle - kind of like a poster.  I wish they still did that.  One other small comment with this puzzle that I haven't experienced with other M & D puzzles is that 2 of the pieces of the interior puzzles have flat sides like an edge piece typically would.  Makes it a little tricky if you typically work from the outside in - but like I said we were looking for a little more difficult puzzle.

title: It never worked!!
text:
***Review Update
I changed the stars to 3 because it still didn't work but they worked with me on making it right. After posting this review, the company I purchased it from contacted me by email. They offered to send me a new one but my grandson had already gone back to Germany. When I told them the situation they gave me a refund.

Overall, maybe the one I purchased was a rare instance. I would recommend buying it but make sure if it doesn't work, you return it within 30 days.

Original Review

Gave this to my 8 year old grandson to use in our pool and it never worked. I bought it early before he came for a visit from Germany. By the time he got here and tried it out, it had been over just over 30 days. That meant I couldn't return it. I had never be seen a 30-day return policy before. It was a complete waste of money!!!

title: You don't get what you see.
text: This is a cute tent so I gave it two stars. However, the lights on the tent were very disappointing. It shows small star lights and big star lights and it only comes with the small ones. When I asked the seller about it they told me the large ones were addaded to it in the picture and and aren't part of it. They also said the small lights were a bonus to their customer which is not true because it's all in the box together. Lastly the lights just sit on the top of the castle. There is nothing to keep them from falling off. With toddlers going in and out that doesn't work very well. Sadly disappointed in this product and the seller for the deceiving picture and saying the lights that do come with it were actually a bonus.

title: Easy to clean
text:
This set comes with EVERYTHING!! It is extensive and provides multiple examples of food. If you are more healthier eating or wish to show your children healthy eating options...this might not be the kit for you.

Alot of fries, juice, sweets, and salty food examples are provided in the play set. The food is a great activity for our toodler to learn stacking and sorting. She spends hours cooking in her pretend kitchen making hot dogs and hamburgers.

The set is a great value. Basically paying 16 cents per item. The iteams ate are easy to clean. We are very pleased with this brand.

This brand has multiple versions of these sets. We will continue to purchase in the future.

title: Needs to come with more for price
text:

The legos are great but more should be given for the price point. Or make the storage container smaller so its not tricking the customer into thinking more is there.

title: Kepts my husband busy
text:
I purchased as part of goodie bags for older kids attending my 1 year old daughters birthday. Something to occupy their mind while tinkerbell was playing for the 3rd time.
When these arrived a saw how interested my husband was. I realized half way through the party my husband had bartered a comic book for the young mans toy. A comic book....valued at who know what. For a cheap plastic toy. He spent his free time at the part figuring out his puzzle with the rest of the kids. This is a memory I will cherish forever. I plan to repurchase as part of a future anniversary gift for him.
If you have a husband to occupy...buy these puzzles :)

title: Lots of fun
text:
So much fun. Its bubbles and a fast way to blow them. Whats not to love. Purchased to put in goodie bags and they were opened half way through the party. A hit for birthdays or any party. The toys lasted with no broken parts after hours of use.
I reccomend these bubble guns.

title: Ultimate is an understatement
text:
This set is great. I think I have more fun coloring than my daughter. I never had this many options growing up. The stardard for us was red, orange, yellow, green, brown, purple. It is a great set to have for any child. Watching my daughter explore new colors and create drawings is the best part.
The sharpener is very convenient. The crayons produce beautiful bright colors. This is a authentic crayola product. I recommend to any child or adult that loves to color go buy this set.

title: Classic card game
text: Loved this game grouping up. Purchased as part of goodie bags for my daughter birthday. They were a hit with parents and kids. I will be purchasing again for gifts.

title: Fun for all ages
text: Purchased this item as part of a goodie bag for my daughters 1 year birthday. I spent most of the week leading up crying about the reality my baby was 1, I hadnt put as much effort into the thank you bags as I had food, decor, entertainment. I purchased this item with a few other quick finds on amazon and assembled into take home treats. It was a hit! The kids were playing together making fun creations. Even adults were having fun in.the nostalgia of play-doh. I will definitely buy again.

title: Nephew approved
text: My poor nephew thought he purchased this game at 5 below. Once we got home from shopping he instantly realized it was actually a puzzle of the game box. Seeing the deflated joy in his eyes, we purchased this for him. He loves it. I still do not understand it at all. But all the kids his age (10) always want to play it. The game and playing cards are color, funny and age appropriate.

title: 5 stars
text:
We had an appointment with a pediatric PT due to head development for our 5 month old. The therapist had placed differnt toys in a circle on a tumbling mat to see what our bany might gravitate too. Once our baby was put down, he instantly went for this toy.
He spent the entire evaluation holding and engaged with it. He barely noticed the neck and shoulders exercises being done, because he was so enamored by this rattle.
The appointment went great, and we placed the amazon order for this toy that night. He still goes directly for this toy regularly.
Feel free to click the "helpful" button so I know if my review was beneficial. If you have questions about my product review please feel free to reach out.
Happy Shopping!

title: Working great for our toddler

Our daughter is 2 1/2 and on the smaller side (40th percentile). The crayons are a little big for her to hold.

title: It is a hit for gifts

She loves it. All of her dolls clothes and accessories all have a neat place to ge stored. This is a great gift for doll lovers.

title: Tummy time fun
text: This play yard is awesome. I was pleasantly suprised at the toys provided. Our son had fun with his tummy time in this. The cleanup is super easy. Which is great with a baby having reflux issues. The lighted star really helped our baby build his neck strength and hand mobility. I like how it is easy to fold and store. Some of the other yards are hard to store due to design.  We plan to purchase in the future for our next expecting friends/family members.

title: Easter egg hunt fun alternative

title: Where have you been....lifesaver!
text:
This product is great! I cannot say enough about how wonderful these three books are. We have a toddler who loves to color on walls. We try to allow her creativity and save our walls at the same time. We have been losing this battle :) I purchased these books as part of her Easter baskets.
I am amazed at how great these are. You fill up the pen with water and your child is ready to color. It's reusable after drying! There is no messy cleanup and the books are made durable. I am so happy with this product. Great job Melissa & Doug!

text:
Like another Reviewer stated, getting into the cardboard box is impossible. I mean, you could rip the gift box to shreds and then just gift the puzzle in a bag or another box, but the gift box is kinda like 1/5th of the gift. At least for me it was... I liked that, from the outside, it added a few more seconds of "I wonder what this is" before they got to the puzzle itself and realized they hate you for making them 'work' for their gift 😂
Bought 2 for gifting graduates and had to return both.

title: Find a YouTube video because the 'destructions' are kinda givverish
text:
I have never - from an established company with a sales volume like NERF - had to find an outside source on how to use a product before buying this for my son. Usually even the things I buy that have crappy, nominal, barely-English instructions are pretty easy to figure out. There are modes and levels and timers yet only 3 buttons with no clearly defined labels (on the unit or in the instructions) on how to use. So to YouTube I went and had to watch a super annoying guy with a weird full-face mask and weirder 'just had my eyes dilated' sunglasses ramble his way through badly giving enough info on how to use that I could demonstrate the toy to my kid.

That said, the little arms are progressively harder to knock back and register points on... which I get why... but even with my kid's "SHEESHAFREAKINGMIGHTY THAT HURTS LIKE A MUTHA..." strong shooter, at close range, it is difficult to knock back the 50 and 75 point arms. It took a LOT of cheating on my part over multiple multiple rounds to sort of decrease the resistance enough that he could actually do it himself (he has fine motor weakness in one hand and doesn't have the cognitive ability to figure out how to use a sight to improve his aim).

Overall a 3.5 to 4 for us.

title: Adorable and fun
text:
I got this for my nephew who just turned 2yo. (*see my caution below)
The Little guy is in the phase of discovery and independence, so this was perfect. I made sure it was on his lap when he unwrapped it, He was fascinated by the sounds and light,and then it rumbled. The the look of joy just before the giggling was priceless! It rumbles and grumbles just like a tractor sound and tractor vibrates for a several seconds. A bit more vibrating than a cell phone, so would likely vibrate off of a table/chair.
He didn't want to open anything else on Christmas. He would go through the room putting it on our laps and pressing rumble, we acted surprised, he laughed and moved to the next person. So adorable!

*I asked his Mom if I could get it for him, and I know that he will always be supervised when using it. I would not recommend a toddler play unsupervised with this, there are little parts that can easily break off and has batteries, all things tikes would be putting in their mouth.
This is super cute, but the arms on the front end, and parts in the cabin dont look like they are sturdy enough to outlast the 2 yo.

I searched for "Tonka" specifically remembering how tough and rugged they were for my three sons, who gave them to their sons 20+ years later. This is all plastic, if you are looking for metal. The Original metal Variety of Tonka are out there, just be sure to read description

title: Your Graduating! Let the World Know
text:
I've got a high school senior in my house and she is only three months away from the end of school and the beginning of a new phase of her life. I want to let people know about her achievements and the arrival of her graduation day so I decided to get this 2023 Graduation Porch Banner

You get two banners with this set. The banners are six feet tall and one foot wide. One has Congrats written large, the other has Graduate written large. The year 2023 isn't indicate on the banners, and that is good because it means you can use them again, for other graduation celebrations.

The material these banners is made from feels like the material on most flags. It is designed not to wrinkle, and it is tear resistant. It comes ready to hang, with a crossbar on the top and extended string. All you need is something to hook the string on. A nail or something similar is ideal, but lots of things will work. It's light enough that you could tape it, if necessary. And it can be displayed indoors or outdoors.

You only graduate high school once. I like bragging a little about my daughter and her achievements and this set of banners helps me do just that. I have them indoors now, but as the big day draws closer, I am going to place them outside, one on each side of the front door, for all to see.

title: Get Ready to Celebrate!
text:
Students are graduating all over the nation this time of year. Graduations mean celebrations and a good way to make sure you have the decorations you need is to purchase a multi- pack like this one, from Officygent.

Inside this package is an assortment of celebratory items, just waiting to be displayed. The large banner, which says We Are So Proud Of You, is just right for this type of occasion and it was the main reason I got this package in the first place. But there is much more to like than just the banner. The black and gold balloons look cool and the large 2022 foil balloons really make a statement. They are almost three feet tall, so every party guest will see them.

You will need to blow up the assorted balloons that come with this set. They are not that big, so it shouldn't be too much of a problem. Even the foil 2022, while tall, to not hold a large amount of volume. With the other items, like the banner and paper fans, they are ready to display in no time. The quality of the items is top- notch and the colors speak elegance.

Graduation happens only once per year. To do things right, you need props and this package from Officygnet has what you need to get the party started. Everything looks good and adding this display items at your graduation celebration is certain to create many lasting memories.

title: Cute Float for Your Pool
text:
Having an inground pool means constantly looking for ways to enhance the experience. We don't do much actual swimming in our pool. We mainly hang out and float, so having pool floats is a necessity. A recent addition to our backyard recreation was this inflatable Mermaid Pool Float from Parentswell.

Pulling this float from the package and unfolding it, you can see that it's going to be larger than most, and it is. The lengthy tail is the reason. Inflating it will require a powerful set of lungs, since it is larger than average. I didn't have a suitable pump for mine, so I did have to inflate the old- fashioned way. It took time, but I got there.

Once inflated, it was ready to test in the pool. The opening in the middle is narrow enough that you can either lie on top of the float without worry that you will fall through. Or, you can stick your body through the center and wear the float, as you drift around in your pool. It works as well as any and the mermaid design is certainly cute. In fact, I would say that the cuteness factor is possibly it's strongest point. It will be a huge hit with anyone who love mermaids.

Pools are better when you have things to enhance the experience. This float from Parentswell is a good one overall. It can take time to inflate but once ready, it holds its own and it does look cute inside my inground pool.

title: Fun Toy for Kids
text:
Want a simple party favor or activity that kids will love? Slime is a good choice for the child who loves to get their hands gooey and a good choice is this Unicorn Slime Toys 32 Pack from Pugndeb.

The standout quality with this slime is that it comes in small, individual packages and there are enough of them to satisfy a large group of party- goers. Just flip open the box and start handing it out. The containers are easy enough to open and kids can get slimy immediately.

This slime is a little on the wet side- more so than other slime and it's also a little on the thin side, which means it tends to slip easily from your hands. The colors are cool and the moment you start to share, and others become aware of the pretty colors and fun waiting to be had, they won't be able to keep their hands off it.

Slime is a fun toy for most any kid and this package of Unicorn slime is a good one to consider for your next kiddie activity. It can be squished and rolled around in the hands for stress relief and for endless giggles, making it perfect for a kids' gathering.

title: Cute, Colorful Puzzles
text:
Young children love to play and have fun. They also need to develop important skills and the best toys are those that combine both fun and learning in one. Puzzles are good for lots of reasons and that's why I like and recommend this six pack of wooden puzzles from DuLaSeed.

Made from wood, this pack of puzzles includes six different, fun shapes. There is a car, plane, and ship along with a bear, bee, and owl. Each puzzle has only a handful of pieces and each is assembled on a flat base. The base already has the outline of the transportation or animal, which helps make it easier for toddlers to figure out which piece goes where.

Each of these six puzzles is brightly colored, and that means children will be naturally drawn to them and want to play. The puzzles are simple enough to complete and they give youngsters a feeling of accomplishment when finished. The other cool thing is that the pieces are large enough that they shouldn't pose a choking hazard. And when finished, just return the puzzles to the included bag. You will need this bag because it will otherwise be very easy to lose pieces.

Kids benefit most from toys that are both fun and educational. This six piece puzzle set helps kids develop find motor skills and the bright colors and simple fun will keep kids entertained. It's made from wood, too, so it's durable. It's a great gift choice for toddlers between the ages of one and three.

title: Helps Kids Improve Fine Motor Skills
text:
Toddler- aged kids benefit greatly from any toy that enhances or encourages learning. If you have a youngster in the roughly two- to four-year-old age group, a good toy option is this 5 in 1 Activity Cube from SYLDD&TH.

Made from wood, this cube shaped toy has different activities on four of its sides, and on top. There are things to move around with the hands and it helps kids with their fine motor skills, coordination, and problem solving. There are just a few loose pieces. To help make sure you don't lose them, the top lifts off and can then be turned upside down and placed into the open end, to seal it shut.

Young people will enjoy moving the different parts on this toy with their tiny hands and parents will like watching and coaching their kids to success. The toy is somewhat small overall- only about six inches on a side- and it is therefore intended for young people with small fingers. Older toddlers might be too big for this toy, so keep that in mind. On the positive side, it is made from wood and seems more durable than many other toys on the market.

Educational toys are among the best for young children. This toy from SYLDD&TH is a very good choice for the toddler in your life. It will help them improve skills and coordination and most kids will have a lot of fun moving the different pieces around and feeling a sense of achievement.

title: Stamps and Markers for Creative Fun
text:
Creative toys are among the very best for kids. They help get kids to use their imagination and no two experiences are ever the same. A good toy to encourage creativity is this Cocomelon Stamp Set by Creative Kids.

The stamps that come with this set are wooden, for added durability. There are four different colors of ink, so kids can vary their choice of color as they stamp. But this is much more than a set of ink stamps. This set also includes markers, plain white sheets, design sheets that already have scenes on them, and even frames to display the young artist's works. The markers don't seem like they are made to last, but they should last long enough to keep kids entertained and you can always replace them with your own set of markers, if necessary.

This toy is based on a popular kids television show, so fans of the show will enjoy it even more. I was not even aware that this was a show- I got the set because it looked like fun and I knew it encouraged creativity. Don't worry if your recipient isn't familiar with the cartoon. Most any kid will find this is a fun toy and they will continue to come back to it, again and again.

Creative toys are among the very best. This Cocomelon Stamp set is an excellent choice for that reason. The stamps, the markers, and the other items included add up to hours and hours of imaginative fun.

title: Squeeze Your Way to Stress Relief
text:
Everyone needs a little stress relief from time to time. Kids experience a different type of stress, or so it seems, and they need something to help reduce tension and regain focus. This Unicorn Stress Balls Set is designed for exactly that purpose.

You get four of these unicorns in the package. They are cute and come in different colors. They way they help relieve stress is by squeezing and stretching them. They have a lot of flexibility, so kids can use them any way they like.

These squeezable toys are good for those with ADHD and other concerns, but the fact is they are good for anyone- not just those with a specific diagnosis. Kids are naturally going to feel anxious at some point and with these unicorns, they can squeeze, pull, and twist their way to relief.

There are lots of similar toys designed for stress relief. This set of unicorns is just as good if not better than the others. The cuteness factor, the irresistible squeezability, and the small, portable size make these a good choice for any parent with a child that needs the occasional tension release or time out.

title: Cute Fidget and Purse Combo
text:
People tend to enjoy fidget toys, and this is especially true of young people. You can go with the usual fidget toy that you hold in your hand and pop the buttons one by one, or you can get a fidget toy that is also something else, like this Pop Purse Fidget Toy from UOYHXQ.

With its six- color pattern, this fidget toy looks bright and colorful. It has an included strap that you will find inside the purse. Don't panic if, like me, you open the package and don't see a strap. Just unzip and there it is, ready for you to attach. The strap is adjustable, too, and the buckles are detachable, if you would rather use the purse that way.

The push buttons on this fidget purse make a soft popping sound as you press them, and like with other fidget toys, this can be useful for stress relief. And remember that both sides of the purse have the bubbles, for added fun. The popping sound is barely audible with this toy, which I think is better than other fidget toys.

Fidget toys are great for curbing anxiety. With this Pop Purse Fidget Toy from UOYHQX, you have not only a fidget toy, but also a cute, simple purse for strapping on your shoulder. It's a fun toy for youngsters and a good option for those who want to combine the fidget fun with a practical item for holding electronics, makeup, etc.

title: Fun for the Young Princess in Your Home
text:
Do you have a little princess in the family? If you have a girl who is preschool age and who likes to imagine herself as a princess, then a toy you might want to consider is this Light Up Princess Vanity Table, from Redbox.

Simple assembly is all that is necessary with this vanity set. It has a mirror, flat surface for the play makeup, a drawer, and a stool. The mirror has a light at the top and it's battery powered, so be prepared to supply them as needed.

Little princesses are almost certain to enjoy this toy. What aspiring princess wouldn't want to sit at a vanity table, try on play makeup, brush hair, and admire herself in the mirror? It's all good fun, but I do have some issues with this vanity set. For one, it doesn't seem very durable and not as likely to last as others. For another, it doesn't seem like the type of toy that will hold a kid's interest for long. If you introduce more things to it, more accessories for example, that will make a difference. Otherwise, it's likely to get old in a short time.

Still, despite its questionable durability and other qualities, the Light Up princess Vanity Table is the type of toy that most preschoolers will love. It encourages imaginative play and it is less expensive than many of the more heavy- duty vanity/beauty toys. Summing up the pros and cons, it does have enough going for it for a small recommendation.

title: Great Educational Fun for Toddlers
text:
Toddlers love any toy with sounds, lights, and action. What's even better is when a toy offers all these features and has educational value, and a fine example is this
Music Bus, from Dumma Baby Toys.

Brightly colored, this bus plays different tunes that can be changed with the push of a button. It has six animal shapes for interactive play and the bus is driven by two cute animals that sway back and forth while the bus moves and the tunes play. The colorful look, the sounds, and the actions will appeal to any youngster.

The music and the sounds of animals that you hear when you push the right shape through the opening are great for kids, but this bus is more about learning than anything. Kids will be challenged to fit the right animal through the matching opening. They can also learn to count using the beads and the interconnected wheels on the back turn together, like gears.

Fitting the animals through the openings can be a challenge for kids, depending on their age, but most kids will be able to figure it out. You may need to coach and encourage your young one, but they will eventually learn how to fit the animals through the openings. Even if they can't at first, they will love the sounds and other features of this colorful bus.

It's great when toys can also serve as a learning tool. This Music Bus from Dumma Baby Toys does exactly that, providing fun sounds, movements, and educational opportunities for toddlers. It's a cool gift that most any young person will enjoy.

title: Move Those Fingers and Melt Away Stress
text:
When your hands are growing restless or you need something quick and simple to do that will relieve stress, you might start tapping your fingers, twirling a pen, or otherwise moving your fingers in some sort of way to get your mind off things. But there is a better option, and it's a fidget toy. Having more than one is even better and that is why you might want this Push Fidget Sensory 4 Pack.

You get an orange heart, yellow heart, purple octagon, and green octagon with this set. The pieces are larger than some other fidget toys and the buttons are a little larger, too, making this a good option for older and younger people. The way it works is simple: Just push the buttons in, listen to them pop, then turn it over and push them the opposite way.

This might sound too simplistic to be any fun, but those who have used these fidget toys will tell you that they do achieve their stated purpose. You do feel a sense of stress relief as you press. It's similar to popping the bubbles on bubble wrap, but the nice thing is that, with a fidget toy like this, you can use it again and again.

We have lots of these fidget toys in my household and this set is just as good if not better than most of the others. The large buttons are nice and since you get a set of four, you have enough to give them to other family members. It's a great remedy for restless fingers and a toy recommended to all.

title: Easy Means to Creative Fun
text:
Most every kid loves to do crafts. And not just the very young- even teenagers enjoy creating works of art and then displaying them for all to see. Paints are among the most sought- after craft and a fun means to encourage your kids' creative side is this Rock Painting kit from Marie's Kids Store.

With this kit, you have all the things you need for creative fun. There are about 10 rocks in the package and 12 different paint colors, along with stickers for added creative fun. There are two paint brushes, too, so kids can add a sibling or friend and paint together.

The rocks included in this kit have a smooth surface, ideal for painting. The paint is waterproof and you don't need to worry about stains, as it wipes up quickly and easily. The containers of paint are small, but there should be enough to last all the way through the painting of each rock. Just make sure to spread out the use of the different colors and there shouldn't be an issue with the paint supply.

Crafts are fun and beneficial for kids. This Rock Painting kit is a great means to hours of fun. It has everything kids need to get their creativity going, all in a single package.

title: Classic Toy for Kids to Enjoy
text:
If you're anything like me, it has likely been a long time since you played with a yo-yo. Many kids don't even know what they are. If you want to introduce your kids to this classic toy, you might consider this set of yo-yos from Giggle Time.

This kit contains a total of 12 yo- yos, which makes it great for handing out to a large number of kids as part of a gift package, fun bag, etc. I was a little disappointed that several of the yo- yo's in my package had come un- stuck from the backing. Since the plan was to hand out some of them to different kids, I had to tape them to the cardboard backing. It made for better presentation.

As for the yo-yos, they glow, which is cool. They are a little less sturdy than expected, however, and the plastic casing isn't as durable as the wooden yo-yos from my youth. Still, they seem okay and should provide a good deal of fun for kids. Yo-yos are good for improving coordination and with a pack of 12, you have all that you need to get a kids' party started.

Yo-yos are not as commonplace as they once were, but they are a classic toy that more kids should get to know and experience. This set from Giggle Time has its issues, but it is still a good option for those parents who want an item to add to goody bags and who want to encourage kids to do something other than stare at a computer or television screen for entertainment.

title: She Makes Statements, Sort Of
text:
Little ones love to have dolls and their faces often light up when they have a doll that does things that make it like a real baby. A doll that can perform actions of some sort is best and that is what you get with Lissi 16" Talking Baby Doll with Accessories.

Out of the package, this doll has a carrier, feeding dish, fork spoon, bottle, etc. There are pjs, too. Press the doll's belly, and you will hear assorted statements such as ha ha, hello, etc. The sounds are what most kids will like best, but the added accessories can also be fun and being able to carry the doll around in its own baby carrier will make little ones feel like grown- ups.

This doll seems like it would be as good as any other doll that makes sounds and takes a bottle. But there are issues and the first one I notice is with the sounds. There are six different sayings, but they are hard to hear and the sounds certainly don't sound like the voice of a baby girl! I couldn't even tell what some of the sayings were. I had to look online to find out what the doll is trying to say.

Other issues are the bottle and pacifier. They do not fit into the baby's mouth and apparently are more for make- believe play than anything. The child I got this for is only two years old, so hopefully, she will not notice or care. Still, it makes me wonder why the manufacturer didn't work a little harder to get these things right.

Most any young child likes dolls and those that make sounds are often popular. This Talking Baby Doll from Lissi is acceptable enough, I suppose. As long as expectations are kept to a minimum, it should be okay.

title: Encourages Creative Play
text:
Entertaining young kids is often easier than you might think. Simple fun is often all it takes, but it's best to at least find something that helps encourage thinking, improves coordination, enhances creativity, etc. A simple toy that does the trick for young people is Unicorn Stickers for Kids - Make A Unicorn Stickers by Mocossmy.

I got these stickers for my wife- she presently teaches kindergarteners and is always in need of something to fill the time each day for creative play. She looked at these stickers and felt they would be a good choice. They are cute and since kids often like to imagine things like unicorns, she knew these stickers would be a hit with the youngsters.

Her intuition was correct, as her kiddos took an instant liking to these unicorn stickers. But what is even better is that they encourage kids to be creative and the reason is because kids get to create the unicorn using additional small stickers to add eyes, crowns, and other assortments. Usually, unicorn stickers are nothing more than a pre- designed unicorn waiting to be peeled and stuck. But here, kids are given a blank slate and then allowed to decorate the unicorn any way they like. That makes these stickers a notch better than others.

Young people need time to play and exercise their developing brains. Unicorn Stickers for Kids - Make A Unicorn Stickers by Mocossmy are more than ordinary stickers. They are like creating a work of art without the mess and they are an easy winner in my wife's eyes and in the eyes of her kindergarteners.

title: Hours of Creative Fun
text:
When it comes time to purchase items for the entertainment of young people, it's easy to just go ahead and find a new electronic game or something else that involves plugging in. But there are other, better, less expensive options out there and one of them is Chalk World Jumbo Sidewalk Chalk Sets For Kids.

Packaged in a plastic container with a pail- like handle, this chalk set includes twenty large pieces of chalk and 7 different colors. The large pieces are difficult to break and should hold up to hours of use. The chalk is non- toxic and easy to wash off the sidewalk when the time comes.

Most kids will use this chalk on the sidewalk, but it can be used on other surfaces, too. It works on wood, bricks, and asphalt black top and because of the contrast, asphalt is probably the best surface of all. If your using this with your kids at home, your driveway is the place it will most likely get used and for most of us, that means concrete. The chalk works fine on concrete and with each piece measuring 4 inches in length and 1 inch in width, it is made to last for a while.

It's fun to let kids be kids and show their creative side. Chalk World Jumbo Sidewalk Chalk Sets For Kids is great for this purpose. Just hand the container to your young ones, send them outdoors, and supervise as they create all sorts of works of art on a concrete or other surface. It's a fun product and one that most ant kid is bound to enjoy.

title: Great for GIF Lovers
text:
GIFs are popular among older kids and among adults- possibly even more so with adults. For the GIF lover in your life, I present to you OH! MY GIF Moving Collectibles Toy with 6 Exclusive Dancing GIFbits.

This set includes six different GIF and to make things more fun, each one features movements of some sort. You activate the movements by pushing or moving different sections of the item. It works a little different from one to the next. With the dog, there is a wind- up on its back and it will therefore continue to move on its own. With the others, you have to activate manually.

Each of the six GIF in this set feature cool, vivid colors and they are cute to look at. The issues I can see are with specific pieces. The donut, for example, doesn't have a base and is therefore a little more of a problem to stand up, since it falls down easily. And the different GIF are inconsistent in what you have to do to make them move. No biggie, just something to keep in mind. For added fun, there is an app you can download, scan included cards, and have the different GIF on your phone.

This is a fun enough set of GIF and if I could change one thing, it would be to have a wind- up on all six of them, and not just the dog, because then you could wind them all up and let them dance the night away. Other than this, the GF Moving Collectibles is a still a fun set for kids and adults alike.

title: Cute and Creative Fun
text:
What young kid doesn't like a fun craft? Most all of them do, and they especially love anything with bright colors, movement, lights, etc. A fun craft that elementary age girls will find to their liking is B Me Make Your Own Fairy Lantern Night Lights

From the box, kids and parents will find that these kits contain everything they need to create their craft, except for the batteries. There are three plastic jars in the package, complete with lights, flowers, ribbons, string, glitter, etc, along with paint brushes and glue. There is a step by step set of instructions that explains exactly what to do.

Putting these fairy lights together is great fun for youngsters. I like that they included three jars per package because that means your young person can have fun three separate times or, if you have more kids, up to three of them can create a jar of their own from a single package. Considering you have everything you need- except the batteries- to build three night lights, the price is more than fair. And since many kids want/need a night light anyway, this craft also serves a practical purpose.

Assembling these night lights doesn't take too much time. It really depends on the amount of decorating your child intends to do. Once the handiwork is in place, it is just a matter of snapping the AAA batteries into the case, screwing it shut, and displaying the masterpiece. The finished product is cute and some parents might even choose to add one to their own bedroom. Your child will love this, especially knowing that they created something so cool that mom and dad want to put it on display in their bedroom.

Kids love crafts and B Me Make Your Own Fairy Lantern Night Lights are a craft your kids are all but sure to enjoy. They bring out your kid's creative side and they are cute and fun!

title: Great for Fortnite Fans
text:
Action toys are among the best. What kid doesn't like a toy that includes movement, sounds, etc? If your child loves Fortnite characters and likes action, then he/she will love the Fortnite Baller Vehicle.

When I first saw this toy, I thought the clear globe inside the box was just for show but it is actually part of the vehicle. Contained inside is one Fortnite figure and the base that the figure and globe rest on is the actual vehicle itself. It comes with a remote control and you have to load batteries into both the vehicle and the remote control before you can use it.

With the remote control in hand, the Fortnite Baller Vehicle is ready for action. The remote has two knobs on it, similar to the controller for home video games. Kids can move each knob and control the movement of the vehicle. I discovered, too, that there is an adjustment level underneath that you can use if the vehicle isn't moving the way you want it to. And since the inside accommodates Fortnite figures, kids can feel free to swap out the one that comes with this toy with another one from the set.

Fortnite fans have any number of toys they can buy that feature their favorite Fortnite characters, but the Fortnite Baller Vehicle is one of the cooler ones available. The remote-controlled movement sets this toy apart and it's a great choice for fans of these action figures.

title: Small, Colorful Puzzles
text:
Youngsters have special educational needs. They love to play and as parents, we want to give them things to play with that also exercise their young, curious, developing minds. A good toy for this purpose is this Wooden Jigsaw Puzzle set from Lemostaar.

Packaged in a box, this set contains 6 different dinosaur puzzles and each of the puzzles has just 6 pieces. The puzzles are each assembled on a small board measuring about 7 by 6 inches. The small size makes the puzzles just right for young kids and the bright colors are certain to get a child's attention.

With only 6 pieces, toddlers are the age group most likely to benefit from these puzzles. Kids have a chance to show their skill as they put each of the pieces into place. Depending on a child's interest and skill level, some may take longer than others, but most preschool age kids will be determined to assemble and show off their completed puzzle to supportive parents.

With all these pieces, there could be a tendency to lose them, but fortunately, the manufacturer includes a storage bag. You could place them back into the box, but the storage bag is better. It's cool that the manufacturer thought to add this because it's practical and better ensures that pieces don't get lost.

Teaching problem- solving skills to young people can be accomplished in many ways and a toy like the Wooden Jigsaw Puzzle set from Lemostaar is useful for this purpose. With 6 puzzles and just 6 pieces each, a young person can complete each with relative ease and improve coordination and other skills in the process.

title: Make Creative Jewelry
text:
Creativity is important for kids and anything that gets them away from electronics is a winner in my book. This is why I was more than happy to introduce my kids to
Snap Pop Beads for Kids, a product from Spartan Production.

The first thing you notice with this toy/craft is the number of beads. There are more than 550 in the package and because there are so many and they are so small, it is easy to lose them over time. Fortunately, the plastic package serves as a storage place and it comes with organizing compartments to keep things separate.

This is a jewelry making kit and youngsters will have fun taking the small beads and inserting them into other pieces which are then threaded through bracelets and other items to create creative jewelry. Kids can be as imaginative as they like and since there are so many pieces and so many unique ways to snap and combine them, there is truly a limitless number of combinations.

The age limit on this toy is three years of age and it most certainly should not be given to any child younger than that, due to the small pieces. My kids are several years beyond age 3, but even if they were younger- say, 5 years old- I am not so sure I would give them a toy like this. I think it is best for upper- grade school age children. And while it is primarily for girls, there is no reason boys can't enjoy it, too.

Toys that require creating and building are among my girls favorites. Young people are almost sure to link Snap Pop Beads for Kids because it lets them create their own jewelry any way they like. Just be sure to clean up after each use so that the small pieces aren't lost and you and your kids will be all set for many episodes of fun and play.

title: Minecraft Fans will be in Heaven
text:
Do you know of any Minecraft fans or fanatics? If you have kids of your own or other young family members, there is almost certainly at least one person who can't get enough of Minecraft. And Minecraft fans everywhere are almost certain to like Minecraft Dungeons 3.25" Arch Illager & Redstone Golem.

This package comes with two figures, both taken straight from the popular Minecraft Dungeons game. There are battle accessories included to kids can create their own battles for hours of imaginative fun. There is a larger and smaller figure that kids can take turns playing with.

Kids who love Minecraft will love playing with the two main figures in this package. The cube- shaped characters might not be very visually appealing to non- fans, but Minecraft lovers will recognize them immediately. They seem to be well made and I like that the limbs are movable, for added fun. And if your Minecraft fanatic likes this set, there are many others you can get.

Minecraft is highly popular among young people and even with some adults. Minecraft Dungeons 3.25" Arch Illager & Redstone Golem is a cool way to keep kids entertained and trust me when I say that fans of Minecraft will not be disappointed.

title: Fun Way for Creative Kids to Pass the Time
text:
Kids like to create things and the more fun and colorful these things are, the better. A cool craft that kidss will enjoy creating and decorating is Alex and Angela Colorful Flower and Vase Art Kit.

Opening up the package reveals two wooden vases, clay, flowers, buttons, and wires. The instructions step you through the decoration of the vases, starting with the snow clay. There are five different colors of snow clay and kids can use it any way they like to create different designs. The suggested design of the rainbow and moon/stars is just that- a suggestion. You can do whatever you like with the colors.

Creating the flowers for the vases requires time and patience, but it's nothing that most kids won't be able to handle. If you get this for a younger child- say, 6 and under- you will likely need to help. But older kids will have no trouble molding the clay, making flowers to the fill the vase, and then proudly displaying their completed work of art when finished.

The most fun with the Alex and Angela Colorful Flower and Vase Art Kit is the creation process. Once completed, the colorful vase can be placed on a nightstand, desktop, etc. The buttons do look a little weird at first but hey, it's all about the creative process and getting kids to put down their electronics.

Creating things and working with different crafts is a great way for kids to spend time. Alex and Angela Colorful Flower and Vase Art Kit is a fun way to craft a vase with clay and decorate with flowers that your child makes themselves. It's a cool kit for grade school age children and is certain to result in a sense of achievement.

title: Smashing Good Times for Kids
text:
Kids who like to assemble things have a multitude of toy options. There are some that take considerable time and effort to put together, but there are others that are less time- consuming. One example of the latter is Smashers Dino Ice Age Mini Surprise Egg.

With this toy, you get an egg- shaped container that includes a Smasher creature to put together, slime packets, and stickers. The egg is larger than I expected and one thing I like is the protruding claw- not only does it look cool, but it lets you know which creature is inside. This is great for those who want to collect all six of these and would prefer not to have it be a guessing game.

As I said, it doesn't take much time to assemble this together, which is good. Once assembled, it's time to let the creative fun begin with the stickers and the crystal slime and other compounds. Kids will have their own unique way to create situations and decorate with the stickers. It's even more fun to have at least two of these and with such a reasonable price point, getting a pair is a good way to start.

If your kids like prehistoric age animals and Smashers in general, then they will like Smashers Dino Ice Age Mini Surprise Egg. Just smash the egg open, assemble, add some slime, and have some frigid fun!

title: Long Crayons and no Paper to Peel
text:
Kids love to color. Traditional crayons easily do the trick, but there is an alternative that some kids and parents might like better, and that alternative is BIC Kids Crayons Assorted Colors.

Each package of these crayons contains 24 different colors. This is a nice assortment and it should keep kids satisfied and occupied for a long time. Whatever they want to color, there should be a shade to match what they need.

The most unusual feature of these crayons is the length. They are longer than the typical crayon and that can be both good and bad, I suppose. There is no paper to peel, which is different from what I am used to and, in many respects, better than other crayons. The long length is good, but it also means they can break easily and they are a little much for the very young. With older kids, however, they will work fine and older kids will actually prefer them to regular crayons.

BIC is mostly known for its pens, but these crayons are a nice way to see the product line expand. You get 24 crayons per pack and three packages total, so you can hand a pack to each of three kids. They last longer than other crayons and make a good choice for young, budding artists everywhere.

title: Roblox Characters in Physical Form
text:
Roblox is hugely popular among young people, many of whom can't wait to engage in any and all things related to these characters. If your kids love Roblox like so many do, then a good toy option is Roblox Action Collection - Meme Pack Playset.

With this mix and match set, kids can create their own Roblox character situations. There are about 25 pieces in the package and it even comes complete with a special code you can use for a virtual item. You get a set of classic Roblox characters plus you can throw in accessories for added fun. The block- like characters look just like they do on the screen and young fans will have a blast playing with actual, physical characters they have grown to love in the virtual world.

Any kid who loves Roblox will love this set, but there are a few issues that some parents may have. One obvious one is that there are several small pieces, which makes them easy to lose. I recommend finding a plastic, resealable bin in which to store the set. And since there are small pieces, it is best not to give this to a young child. It is intended more for older elementary school age kids.

Roblox has its share of fans and the Roblox Action Collection - Meme Pack Playset is certain to make any Roblox fan fall in love. What could be better than having these characters you have grown to love on a screen suddenly show up in a package, in physical form? It's bound to make Roblox fans everywhere as pleased as punch and it makes this toy a great gift for young fanatics.

title: Coloring and Puzzle Assembly All in One
text:
Kids need time to take a break from schoolwork. But often, the breaks they take involve television or smart phones. There are lots of great non- electronic alternatives and one of them is the BEARUN 3D Coloring Puzzle Set.

This set is a combination puzzle and coloring activity. Kids start by coloring one of the puzzles' pieces. The set includes a house, windmill, dinosaur, etc. and the pieces are on a rectangular board. Kids color them, then the pieces need to be punched out of the board for assembly.

To help with the coloring, this kit comes complete with a set of 12 markers and they are dual- tipped. One side is a fine tipped marker designed for drawing thin lines while the other side is a brush tip designed for making wider lines. Kids are free to color whatever way they like, using the 12 vibrant colors. The more artistic kids will have fun alternating colors into an artful design while other creative kids will add their own individual flair.

Once kids finish coloring, the pieces are punched from the board and the items is then assembled. This is a large part of the fun and it helps kids improve their motor skills. When the items are assembled, kids can then display their work of art on a desktop or other flat surface, for all to see. It takes some effort to assemble, and some younger kids might need assistance. Otherwise, the assembly of the puzzle is a big part of the fun.

Kids need to take breaks and what better way to enjoy free time then by creating something fun? BEARUN 3D Coloring Puzzle Kit is two activities in one and kids will love both the coloring and assembling aspects of this educational and artistic activity. I can't really find anything to criticize and it thus earns my highest recommendation.

title: Drift Away with Aqua Contour Lounge
text:
I have an in-ground pool and I'm always looking for ways to enhance the family pool time experience with added accessories. There are some fancy floats that have made their way into my pool, but I've also had simpler floats that are good in their own way and a good example of the latter is Aqua 18- pocket inflatable contour lounger.

This oblong float is intended to hold one individual. It measures about 6 feet in length so if you're very much taller than average, your feet are going to hang over the edge. The float has an inflatable pillow so you can get some much-needed head support while you rest.

I have other loungers like this one, but what sets the Aqua 18- pocket inflatable contour lounger apart from my others is the pockets. These are open spaces, spaced out along the body of the float, that allow the water to touch your body. Some may not like this idea at first, but it is quite nice because it keeps you from getting too hot. With other floats, your entire body is exposed to the sun and if the heat is extreme, you will likely only be able to last a short time before having to jump completely into the water to cool off. With this float, the pool water is always touching parts of your skin, helping to keep you cool.

It takes only a short time to inflate this lounger. It can hold up to 250 pounds and it keeps you comfortably suspended above the water. With the headrest, you can kick back and float in total comfort. It's very easy, as you might guess, to fall asleep on this lounger so keep that in mind before you climb aboard.

Accessories make swimming better and an assortment of different floats is essential for any pool owner. Aqua 18- pocket inflatable contour lounger is a very nice accessory for my pool and one that my family has quickly taken a liking to. The open pockets help keep you cool and it's a great way to relax on a sunny day.

title: Attractive and Fun Float
text:
When you have your own pool, you need at least a few accessories to make things fun. I find that we tend to go through these accessories quickly and are in constant need of replacements. With the warm season upon us, it was time to add a few things for the new year, starting with the Poolmaster Swimming Pool Float Rainbow Glitter Tiara Tube.

This float is very girly in design, with multiple colors, glitter, and a tiara- shaped headrest. You can either sit on the tube and rest your head on the tiara, or place your body through the opening in the middle and use it to remain afloat as you walk around in the water.

This float looks cute and is large enough to handle most adults. The good news is that kids can use it, too, and young fans of princesses will like it best. It's small enough that kids can lie down on it with no worries. Most adults won't be able to fit their full body on top without their legs dangling over the edge, but that's okay. It is still fun to use and good for general floating.

We go through a good deal of floats with our pool. Poolmaster Swimming Pool Float Rainbow Glitter Tiara Tube has made quite a splash with my kiddos. The colors and glitter make it more attractive than most floats and given its appearance and quality, it's a float that I'm hoping will rank among our favorites and will be used for the duration of the year.

title: Good Option for the Young, Budding Musician
text:
One of the foremost names in kids' toys is Fisher- Price toys. They have been keeping kids entertained and happy for many decades and I have both played with and purchased many of them. My latest acquisition is the Fisher- Price Jump N Jam Guitar.

Designed for youngsters age 3 and up, this guitar is quite small in size and won't be suitable for bigger kids. It features a minimal number of tones and kids play it by jumping up and down. There are no strings like on other toy guitars, so there are no worries there. It is designed to produce a few simple sounds and that is it.

I like the bright colors of this toy guitar and it does serve to satisfy the desires of a young, budding musician. However, because it is so simple, kids are likely to lose interest in a short time. If a child is very young, I think they will like this and continue to like it for some time. But older kids will likely grow tired of it. For this reason, and the small size, I question the recommended age of 3 and up. I think it is best for younger toddlers.

This Fisher Price guitar takes batteries, but the cool thing is that it comes with batteries, ready to use straight from the package. It's an okay toy overall that may or may not be a hit for your child or grandchild.

title: A Few Good Qualities, but the Bad Outweigh the Good
text:
Toddlers love to play and they benefit from toys that encourage learning or help in other areas of development. One toy that seems promising in these ways is the B'S Eye View Peg Puzzle Dexterity Toy – Classic Wooden Puzzle for Toddlers.

This puzzle has knobs on the pieces, making it easy for toddlers to grab each piece. It helps with coordination, too, as little ones will learn to fit the right shape into the right slot. However, the colors of the pieces are washed out and they really need to be an eye catching primary. Not only would it be more inviting to toddlers and preschoolers but it would provide an opportunity to not only teach numbers and counting, but color recognition too while playing.

Another issue with the pieces is that the details are lacking. If you are going to add detail make it something a child can recognize. But probably the most shocking oversight is the shapes and numbers that they are supposed to match. There is an octagon, for example, that represents the number 7, a five- pointed star that is used for the number 8, and so on. Why would you do this? The octagon should be the number 8 and the star should match with number 5. This is an oversight that someone should have caught.

Other issues I have are with the puzzle holes- they are a little too big and this would be hard to travel anywhere with. I do like that the numbers are nice and big and easy to see and that the knobs are big and tall enough for tiny fingers to grasp. While I haven't seen it happen yet I do worry because, since they are very much like thumbtacks, they may come loose and eventually get lost. The pieces don't hold in place as well as I would like.

Toddler toys that help kids learn are nice and while the B'S Eye View Peg Puzzle Dexterity Toy – Classic Wooden Puzzle for Toddlers does help with coordination and other skills, it lacks in other areas. The oversight with the numbers and shapes not matching is a big one and I have other issues, too. So, when I think of everything as a whole, this toy gets a thumbs down from me.

title: Fun in the Tub with Tiny Tugboats
text:
Toddlers like to have fun in the tub. Melissa and Doug have toys designed for most every stage of a child's life and a specific toy they have for the very young that is designed for use in the bathtub is Float- Alongs: Tiny Tugboats.

This toy consists of a book with a few pages and three tugboats. Melissa and Doug stick with the primary colors of blue, red, and yellow for the three boats. Each boat corresponds to one of three sections of the book. The words are minimal in the book and are meant for parents to read along as their little one plays with the boats.

The book part of this toy is made with vinyl pages so that it can be used directly in the tub. Toddlers will like the boats the most because they provide interactive play. I like that the book has a netted attachment to store the boats because they would otherwise certainly get lost over time.

This is a simple enough toy for toddlers and it does make bath time more enjoyable. Leave it to Melissa and Doug to come up with an age- appropriate toy for the tiniest of children. They have certainly achieved their mission with this toy and it's one that most any child will like.

title: A Blast from the Past
text:
Kids toys come and go, but some of them have staying power. A good example is the Basic Fun Fisher Price Pocket Camera, a toy that I can remember from my own youth that is still around and still brings smiles to kids' faces.

This simple toy is shaped like the pocket cameras of yesteryear. It has pics of a trip to the zoo and kids can view each pic by pressing the button. With each push, the flash cube turns, just like they did on the cameras from back in the 1970's, which was when this Fisher- Price toy first appeared. There is another viewer opening that is clear and lets you see whatever is in front of the camera. But kids will most likely want to use the other view finder and look at the zoo animals.

There are no batteries needed for this toy. It is completely mechanical in nature. And like the pocket cameras from the past, it has an attached loop so that kids can carry it on their wrist.

The camera is recommended for kids age 2 to 5, but younger toddlers can enjoy it, too. All they need to do is be able to push the button. It's a simple toy but still fun for the youngsters and it proves that some toys continue to have timeless appeal.

title: Fun Train that Stimulates the Imagination
text:
Trains are a classic toy. Most of them are electronic, high- tech in nature, and can be made to look and sound like an authentic train, in small scale of course. But there is also something to be said for a train that isn't electronic and requires imagination more than anything. This is what you get with the Battat Deluxe Wooden Train.

This train set comes with track, train, and a large number of accessories. It's easy to assemble the track because it interlocks with almost no effort. Setting up the accessories takes time, but this is perfect for the more imaginative child and parents will enjoy just sitting back and letting their youngster take over.

The quality level of this set is good and the pieces are made from wood. Once assembled, it covers about four feet by three feet of space, so it will fit on most tables. If you don't have available table space to spare, just set it up on the floor instead. A smooth surface is best, of course, but a flat carpet may work, too.

With the train cars, they are held together by magnets and this is good enough for this type of train. One issue some people may have is with the track. The interlocking isn't very secure and that means the track is easy to bump out of place. Metal tracks hold together better, but this isn't a huge issue, really. Most kids won't mind this aspect of the set up.

There are some really cool electronic trains on the market, but trains that require manual movements and that lack sound and other automated features can be just as fun. The Battat Deluxe Wooden Train is good for this purpose. It's made with a good deal of quality in mind and it's great for stimulating a child's imagination.

title: Durable Cards for Everyday Use
text:
Most every home has at least one deck of playing cards. There are so many games that can be played with a deck of cards that it makes sense to have them handy, but some playing cards are less durable than others and more likely to wear out in a short time. If you want cards that last, a good choice is Nod Products Dry Decks Waterproof Playing Cards.

Nod Products makes several different versions of these cards, with a pair of decks in each package. The differences are with the back of card design. This specific set shows a beer jug on one of the sets and an assortment of small symbols like beer glasses, barrels, barely etc. on the other. Nod Products has a set for different tastes and since I'm a beer writer, this set is perfect for me.

As for the cards, they are more durable than most, with a plastic coating that protects the cards from wear and tear. The coating is very good- you can wipe off the cards if they come on contact with food or drink, making them look like new. They are slick and don't stick together, either, so you are less likely to experience a misdeal during your next round of euchre.

My one issue I have with these cards is the lack of detail on the main side of the card. The King, Queen, and Jack do not feature a face. All you get is a double image of the suit, in the middle of the card. The same is true with the numbered cards. Whether you're holding up a 2, 6, Jack, or any other card, you have the same image in the middle: A pair of hearts, diamonds, spades, or clubs. I would like it better if there was something more artistic and visual.

Playing cards are a household essential and Nod Products Dry Decks Waterproof Playing Cards with Beer images is a good set of cards. I would like them more if they had better images on the main side of the cards, but I love the durability and they are great when you like to play cards while you eat and drink.

title: Liven Up Your Next Pool Party with Aqua Flash
text:
With a large in-ground pool in my backyard, we spend a good deal of time outdoors. The pool is great for cooling off during our hot Gulf Coast summer season and we have a fair number of pool toys to keep us entertained. The Aqua Flash Scorch the Dragon LED Light Up Pool Float is our latest addition to our growing and expanding number of pool accessories.

This pool float is large in size and can hold two young kids with ease. You just inflate, add the lights, and you're ready to go. There are no batteries included, so you will likely need to run to the store to purchase some, since each of the puck lights requires three batteries. Pick up a large pack of alkaline batteries and you should be all set.

With its large size, this float makes an imposing presence in the pool, but the coolest aspect of this float is the added lights. It comes with a remote control so you can switch the patterns around, from strobe to fade to flash to smooth. My kids like the lights more than anything. They already have plenty of other floats, but none of them have lights like this. During the evening hours, the flashing lights really help to spruce up a party. I did notice that the float does lose air after a few days and we have to re- inflate, but this is common with most floats and isn't an important issue.

Aqua flash Scorch the Dragon LED turned out to be hugely popular with my family and it has been a great addition to our pool. There is no shortage of pool floats on the market, but the difference with this float is the lights. They really add to the float's appeal and make it an excellent choice as your next pool accessory.

title: Fun Solar System Model for Budding Astronomers
text:
Do you have a young astronomer in your home? I do, and her love of outer space convinced me to get her the Geosafari Motorized Solar System, a model of the solar system with planets, lights, etc.

Assembling this solar system is the first thing you need to do. Kids who already know about the solar system and planet order will have no problem placing the planets in the correct spot. Once the planets are set, just hit the switch and watch them turn. The inner planets move faster than the outer planets, for a dose of realism. It would be even better if each planet moved at its own, relative speed, but the technology isn't quite at that level. Still, it's good the way it is and better than other models that either don't have the planets move at all or all move at the same speed.

One of the other fun features of this solar system is the constellation projection. Just turn off the lights and it will project constellations on the surrounding ceiling and walls. This is cool for scientifically minded youngsters who will love watching as their bedroom is transformed into a planetarium. And it will shutoff automatically, so you don't need to worry about burning out the light too quickly.

The Geosafari Motorized Solar System is fun and educational, but there are a few ways it could be improved. One would be to turn it into a craft by including colored paints so that kids can paint each planet before assembly. Another would be to make it a little more realistic, as stated above, with the movements by making them relative based on the planet's actual orbit speed. This might seem like I'm asking too much but trust me- if the young astronomer in your home is up to speed on his/her solar system like mine is, one of the first questions they will ask is why the inner planets move at the same speed and the outer planets move at the same speed, since this isn't realistic. Some kids will even wonder why the planets are not relatively sized also, but I realize and most kids will realize that this would not be practical because it would require making some planets either very big or very small.

Regardless of these concerns, kids who love astronomy will enjoy the Geosafari Motorized Solar System. The movement of the planets and the projection features are both quite cool and budding astronomers should find everything mostly to their liking. It's good for learning and fun, and a nice gift idea for youngsters.

title: It Works as Claimed, but Does Little Else
text:
My kids like their science, particularly my youngest who envisions, among other things, working for the government and taking part in the first mission to Mars. So, given my kids interest in all things scientific, the Tin Can Edge Detector looked like something they would enjoy building and examining from a scientific point of view.

Putting this little machine together takes some effort and one reason it takes more work than it should is the instructions. They are not written as clearly as they should be. It would not have been that difficult for the manufacturer to get this right, but it seems they put little effort into it. You have to supply your own battery and a can, but most importantly, you have to be patient and give it time. It's also best to have an adult take charge, as young children will grow frustrated if they attempt this on their own.

Once assembled, you just place the robot on a table and let it do its thing. As expected, it moves across the surface until it detects an edge, then it reverses itself. It seemed to have no trouble doing what it claimed, and that is detecting when it reached the table's edge and not falling off. In that respect, the robot functions as it should.

Now, what about the science? Well, It can teach a little bit about robotics, but that is about the extent of the educational value. There isn't much else to it. Oh, and green advocates will like that it requires you to provide your own soda can because it encourages recycling

Science is a popular subject with my kids but they had a difficult time getting fired up over the Tin Can Edge Detector. The problem, from a kid's perspective, is that it doesn't really do enough to make it interesting. Simply crawling around on a table and not falling off just didn't cut it for my kids. Adults will dislike the assembly more than anything and the limited educational value is also a drawback. Still, it does offer kids and parents an excuse to spend a little time together and it does what the manufacturer claims, so I'm going to give it a middle rating and a passing grade. There are better educational toys, but there is enough here to keep kids semi- interested for a low price.

title: Exceptional Science Kit
text:
Do your kids enjoy science? Mine certainly do and they love anything that is interactive and involves more than simply reading a book. This is why they love science kits the way they do and one kit they really enjoy is the Thames and Kosmos Nanotechnology Kit.

I have purchased countless science kits over the years for my youngsters and my kids have played with each, often with varying degrees of interest. The problem with many science kits is that the package doesn't really contain enough to conduct the experiments- you are required to supply almost all of the materials, measuring devices, etc. yourself. Another problem is that many of science kits contain experiments that are too simple and don't really challenge any child beyond the age of six. But with Thames and Kosmos Nanotechnology Kit, my children and I quickly discovered that a store purchased science kit can be fun, challenging, and complete. You know the moment you open the box that this science kit is different and the uniqueness only serves to encourage children to open the manual and start conducting experiments. Just looking at the contents reminded me of the science from high school.

The science experiments in this kit revolve around the world of nanotechnology and they serve to educate children on this tiny, micro world. The experiments deliver on their promises and kids really do learn a great deal. Some of the experiments are actually more complex than expected so if your kids are younger, you may need to step in and offer your assistance. I didn't mind at all, in part because, as I completed the experiments with my kids, I found that I enjoyed the experience just about as much as they did.

Another added touch I like with this kit is the included game board. This is a great idea, because the board helps to further educate children by showing how different experiments relate to each other. Everything is diagrammed and once kids see the visual representation, they will better understand how each experiment works and how things tie together.

Educational toys are great and make for an important diversion from the mindless drabble so common to most forms of child amusement. Thames and Kosmos Nanotechnology is one of the best science kits I have ever encountered and while the price is a little higher than that of other kits, it is certainly money well invested and it will help develop a child's understanding and interest in science to levels you never would have thought possible.

title: Another Barbie Doll of Average Worth
text:
Barbie is an iconic doll and one recognizable to most anyone. The manufacturer keeps doing what it can to keep people interested, coming out with new versions of Barbie every so often like this one, Secret Agent Barbie.

My girls don't rank Barbie as their favorite doll character, but they do like her and so they welcomed the chance to add Secret Agent Barbie to their collection. They and I both agree that Barbie's outfit is cool, with lots of color and style. She looks like a million bucks, ready to take on any secret mission that comes her way.
